steps.step: Combine 10 ounce chocolate and butter in a glass bowl.
Stir in jam and chambord. Cover and refrigerate 4 hours.
Scrape into 1 inch balls w/ melon baller. Put in freezer until firm.
Place remaining 12 ounce of chocolate into microwave for 3 to 3 1/2 minutes or until melted. Dip truffles in chocolate. Place on paper lined baking pan.
Refrigerate 1/2 hour. Put in air-tight container.
Store in refrigerator 2 weeks or freezer for 1 month.
